articles.title: Son dakika deprem mi oldu? Az önce deprem nerede oldu? İstanbul, Ankara, İzmir ve il il AFAD son depremler 04 Şubat 2026
articles.title_tr: Son dakika deprem mi oldu? Az önce deprem nerede oldu? İstanbul, Ankara, İzmir ve il il AFAD son depremler 04 Şubat 2026
articles.summary: Son depremler... Son dakika deprem mi oldu? Az önce deprem nerede oldu? İstanbul, Ankara, İzmir ve il il AFAD son depremler.. 04 Şubat 2026 deprem son dakika haberleri haberin detayında... Artçı deprem mi oldu? Son deprem büyüklüğü ne kadar? Yakınımdaki depremler nelerdir? Anlık deprem mi oldu? Son dakika canlı deprem Türkiye haritası.. Kandilli Rasathanesi ve Deprem Araştırma Enstitüsü ve AFAD deprem haberleri.. İstanbul'da deprem mi oldu? Ankara'da deprem mi oldu? İzmir'de deprem mi oldu? Hangi illerde deprem oldu ve hissedildi? Bugün deprem mi oldu? Deprem ne zaman ve kaç şiddetinde oldu? En son hangi bölgede deprem oldu? Deprem haberleriyle ilgili en çok merak edilenlerin cevabı haberde..

articles.title: Borderlands 4 On Switch 2 Has Paused Development, And Might Never Release
articles.title_tr: Borderlands 4 On Switch 2 Has Paused Development, And Might Never Release
articles.summary: In a recently-released roadmap for the future of Borderlands 4, one milestone was suspiciously absent--the game's Switch 2 port, which was previously delayed indefinitely just 10 days before its original launch date. Now, publisher Take-Two Interactive has revealed why that's the case, and it's not good news for anyone holding out for the game on Nintendo's hybrid console.In an interview with Variety, spokesperson Alan Lewis has revealed that development on the Switch 2 version is paused. "We made the difficult decision to pause development on that SKU," he told the outlet, while affirming that the company is still committing to the system with upcoming games like PGA Tour 2K25 and WWE 2K26.The use of the word "pause" indicates that development on the Switch 2 port of Borderlands 4 could, theoretically, resume in the future, as it's not technically cancelled, but there's no guarantee that this will happen. The game reportedly sold below expectations at launch, despite also having the biggest launch in the franchise's history.Continue Reading at GameSpot

The game reportedly sold below expectations at launch, despite also having the biggest launch in the franchise's history.Continue Reading at GameSpot

"We

articles.title: New York borsası düşüşle kapandı
articles.title_tr: New York borsası düşüşle kapandı
articles.summary: New York borsası, teknoloji hisseleri öncülüğünde günü düşüşle tamamladı. Kapanışta Dow Jones endeksi yüzde 0,34 azalarak 49.240,99 puana geriledi. S&P 500 endeksi yüzde 0,84 azalışla 6.917,79 puana ve Nasdaq endeksi yüzde 1,43 kayıpla 23.255,19 puana indi.

articles.title: Havertz strikes as Arsenal beat Chelsea to reach Carabao Cup final
articles.title_tr: Havertz strikes as Arsenal beat Chelsea to reach Carabao Cup final
articles.summary: Arsenal claimed their place in the Carabao Cup final as Kai Havertz's breakaway goal in stoppage time sealed a 1-0 win over Chelsea at the Emirates Stadium and a 4-2 victory on aggregate.

articles.title: Beloved Baldur's Gate 3 Characters Are Getting New Magic The Gathering Cards
articles.title_tr: Beloved Baldur's Gate 3 Characters Are Getting New Magic The Gathering Cards
articles.summary: Another Magic: The Gathering Secret Lair Superdrop is on its way, two weeks after the Fallout TV show featured in a quartet of themed drops. This time, however, there are seven drops themed around Dungeons & Dragons, and two of them focus on fan-favorite heroes from Baldur's Gate 3.Shadowheart, Dark JusticiarFirst is Secret Lair x Dungeons & Dragons: Shadowheart's Devotion, which highlights the half-elf cleric of Shar. Her legendary creature card from Battle for Baldur's Gate is among the five reprints in the drop, along with an ancient dragon and three cards that would synergize well with her in a Shadowheart commander deck:Shadowheart, Dark JusticiarBeseech the QueenBlack MarketVictimizeAncient Bronze DragonGale, as he appears on BrainstormThe other Baldur's Gate 3 drop is called Secret Lair x Dungeons & Dragons: Gale's Ambition, and it features the wizard from Waterdeep. Like Shadowheart, Gale's previous legendary creature card is paired with four other reprints that complement his powers:Continue Reading at GameSpot

Her legendary creature card from Battle for Baldur's Gate is among the five reprints in the drop, along with an ancient dragon and three cards that would synergize well with her in a Shadowheart commander deck:Shadowheart, Dark JusticiarBeseech the QueenBlack MarketVictimizeAncient Bronze DragonGale, as he appears on BrainstormThe other Baldur's Gate 3 drop is called Secret Lair x Dungeons & Dragons: Gale's Ambition, and it features the wizard from Waterdeep. Like Shadowheart, Gale's previous legendary creature card is paired with four other reprints that complement his powers:Continue Reading at GameSpot

Her legendary creature card from Battle for Baldur's Gate is among the five

articles.title: Take-Two CEO Responds to Stock Price Drop Following Google Genie Announcement: 'I Think People Are Confusing Tools With Hits'
articles.title_tr: Take-Two CEO Responds to Stock Price Drop Following Google Genie Announcement: 'I Think People Are Confusing Tools With Hits'
articles.summary: Last week, Google announced Project Genie, an AI-powered virtual world creator still in its infancy that seemed to spook a number of video game investors. But at least one video game CEO isn't ruffled: Take-Two's Strauss Zelnick.

articles.title: Generative AI Is Not Going To "Eat" The Games Industry, Expert Says
articles.title_tr: Generative AI Is Not Going To "Eat" The Games Industry, Expert Says
articles.summary: Recently, popular video game stocks like GTA 6 owner Take-Two ($TTWO), game development engine Unity ($U), and sandbox game Roblox ($RBLX) saw huge sell-offs that hammered share prices in the wake of Google's announcement of a new generative AI tool called Project Genie.The product claims it can create worlds "generated in real time," and people quickly put it to use to create rip-offs of Mario and Fortnite, among many others. The generative AI tool seemingly spooked some investors, prompting the stocks to get hammered. But how big of a threat to the industry mainstays is Project Genie, or generative AI systems like it?"Wall Street has lost the plot again"Rhys Elliott of Alinea Analytics told GameSpot that "Wall Street has lost the plot again" and that generative AI is "not coming to eat the games industry."Continue Reading at GameSpot

The generative AI tool seemingly spooked some investors, prompting the stocks to get hammered. articles.title: GTA 6 Marketing Will Kick Off This Summer, as Take-Two Confidently Reaffirms November Release Date
articles.title_tr: GTA 6 Marketing Will Kick Off This Summer, as Take-Two Confidently Reaffirms November Release Date
articles.summary: Grand Theft Auto VI's November 19, 2026 release date is drawing nearer, and Take-Two Interactive is starting to sound more confident than ever that this time, it's really happening. So confident, in fact, it's announced that Rockstar will be spinning up its marketing beats this summer.

articles.title_tr: Yeşil Mavi Yol’un Mimarı Çiftlikköy’de Konuşacak
articles.summary: Yalova Valisi olarak görev yaptığı yıllarda “Yeşil Mavi Yol” adlı Turizm Seyir Yolu’nun Yalova’ya kazandırılmasında öncü olan İstanbul İstinye Üniversitesi İktisadi, İdari ve Sosyal Bilimler Fakültesi Öğretim Üyesi Prof. Dr. Yusuf Erbay, 6 Şubat Cuma günü Çiftlikköy’de “Sürdürülebilir Çevre Sohbetleri” gerçekleştirecek.

articles.title: Türk Eğitim-Sen Yalova’dan Enflasyon Tepkisi
articles.title_tr: Türk Eğitim-Sen Yalova’dan Enflasyon Tepkisi
articles.summary: Türk Eğitim-Sen Yalova Şube Başkanı Mustafa Deviren, TÜİK’in açıkladığı ocak ayı enflasyon verilerinin ardından yaptığı basın açıklamasında, memur ve emekli maaşlarının daha yılın ilk ayında eridiğini belirterek ek zam ve refah payı çağrısında bulundu.

1973 Tokmakspor:0 Çiftlikköy Belediyespor:5

Süper Amatör Kümede liderlik koltuğunda oturan Çiftlikköy Belediyespor 11. Haftada son sıradaki 1973 Tokmakspor’un konuğu oldu.

articles.title: 'He's a work in progress off the field' - McCullum defends 'sensational' Brook
articles.title_tr: 'He's a work in progress off the field' - McCullum defends 'sensational' Brook
articles.summary: England head coach Brendon McCullum has praised the way Harry Brook has dealt with recent controversy but admits his white-ball captain is a "work in progress" away from the cricket field.
